title: Conferences
description: Schema for conferences data in the 757 Community site

url.description: The URL to the conference's website

description.description: A brief description of the conference

date.description: The start date of the conference in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.description: The end date of the conference in YYYY-MM-DD format

tags.description: An array of tags that describe the conference

coverImage.description: URL to a fallback cover image for the conference
